TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmpBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class WmpBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義用來編碼 Microsoft Windows Media Photo 影像的編碼器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Microsoft Windows Media Photo images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是新的轉碼器，提供更佳的映像畫質比 JPEG 與較小的檔案大小和更多的功能。 is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像會使用單一演算法，以達成失真及不失真的壓縮。 images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支援現有中繼資料的標準。 images support existing metadata standards. 如需這種格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows 媒體相片規格](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。For additional information about this format, see [Windows Media Photo Specification](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx). [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 檔案不支援全域縮圖預覽、 框架層級的縮圖或多個框架。 files do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, or multiple frames. 編碼不在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化至新的點陣圖影像編碼。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/WDPEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/WDPEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/WDPEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte AlphaDataDiscardLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.AlphaDataDiscardLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮領域轉換期間捨棄的 Alpha 頻率資料等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of alpha frequency data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.

value.span: 編碼影像時要捨棄的 Alpha 資料等級。

span.span: The level of alpha data to discard when encoding the image.

value.span: 值範圍是 0 (不捨棄資料) 至 4 (完全捨棄 Alpha 色頻)。

span.span: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 4 (alpha channel completely discarded).
The default is 1.

item.description: 會捨棄任何映像的頻率資料。
FlexBits 都會被捨棄。影像的影像品質會降低而不會變更實際的解析度的影像。
落在高通頻帶資料會被捨棄。影像的有效解析度會減少在兩個維度的 4 倍。
落在高通和低通濾波器頻率資料群組列會被捨棄。影像的有效解析度會減少在兩個維度 16 倍。
會完全捨棄 alpha 色板。像素格式變更為反映移除 alpha 色板。
No image frequency data is discarded.
FlexBits are discarded. The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.
HighPass frequency data band is discarded. The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.
HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded. The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.
The alpha channel is completely discarded. The pixel format is changed to reflect the removal of the alpha channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的效果才設`true`映像包含可能是平面或交錯 alpha 色板，否則會忽略。This property has an effect only if is set to `true` and the image contains either a planar or interleaved alpha channel; otherwise, it is ignored.

exception.span: 指定的值不在 0 和 4 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 4.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte AlphaQualityLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.AlphaQualityLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定平面 Alpha 色頻的壓縮品質。

span.span: Gets or sets the compression quality for a planar alpha channel.

value.span: 平面 Alpha 色頻影像的壓縮品質。

span.span: The compression quality for a planar alpha channel image.

value.span: 值 1 視為不失真，而增加這個值會產生較高的壓縮比率，而且影像品質會較差。

span.span: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and increasing values result in higher compression ratios and lower image quality.
The value range is 1 to 255.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的效果才是`false`。This property has an effect only if is `false`.

summary.span: 壓縮領域作業是轉換作業，不需要對影像資料進行解碼就可以完成。

span.span: Compressed domain operations are transformation operations that are done without decoding the image data.

value.span: 如果可以使用壓縮領域作業則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if compressed domain operations can be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

member this.FrequencyOrder : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要以頻率順序來進行編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encoding in frequency order.

value.span: 表示以頻率順序編碼影像， 則表示根據空間方向編碼影像。

span.span: to encode the image in frequency order; to encode the image by its spatial orientation.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short HorizontalTileSlices { short get(); void set(short value); };
member this.HorizontalTileSlices : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮編碼期間使用的水平分割數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.

summary.span: 單一分割可以建立兩個水平區域。

span.span: A single division creates two horizontal regions.

value.span: 要在壓縮編碼期間使用的水平分割數。

span.span: The number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.
The value range is 0 to 4095.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，必須設定為 0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 相除所建立的磚不可以小於 16 像素為單位。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 值會調整為維護小的區塊大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 當用於搭配，方格的磚不正確。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果這兩個屬性會設定為 1，映像分為 4 的磚。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.

member this.IgnoreOverlap : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要忽略子區域壓縮領域編碼中的區塊重疊像素。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to ignore region overlap pixels in subregion compressed domain encoding.

summary.span: 此功能目前尚未實作。

span.span: This feature is not currently implemented.

value.span: 如果忽略重疊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if overlap is ignored; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值是唯一時才有效是`true`和子區域編碼要求。This value is valid only when is `true` and a subregion encode is requested.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte ImageDataDiscardLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.ImageDataDiscardLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮領域轉換期間捨棄的影像資料等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of image data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.

value.span: 要在影像的壓縮領域轉換的期間捨棄的影像資料等級。

span.span: The level of image data to discard during a compressed domain encoding of the image.

value.span: 值範圍是 0 (不捨棄資料) 至 3 (捨棄 HighPass 和 LowPass)。

span.span: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 3 (HighPass and LowPass discarded).
The default is 1.

item.description: 會捨棄任何映像的頻率資料。
FlexBits 都會被捨棄。影像的影像品質會降低而不會變更實際的解析度的影像。
落在高通頻帶資料會被捨棄。影像的有效解析度會減少在兩個維度的 4 倍。
落在高通和低通濾波器頻率資料群組列會被捨棄。影像的有效解析度會減少在兩個維度 16 倍。
No image frequency data is discarded.
FlexBits are discarded. The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.
HighPass frequency data band is discarded. The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.
HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded. The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的效果才設為`true`; 否則它會被忽略。This property has an effect only if is set to `true`; otherwise, it is ignored.

exception.span: 指定的值不在 0 和 3 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 3.

summary.span: 取得或設定影像品質等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the image quality level.
The image quality level.

value.span: 範圍是 0 至 1.0 (不失真影像品質)。

span.span: The range is 0 to 1.0 (lossless image quality).
The default is 0.9.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要將 Alpha 色頻資料編碼為額外的交錯色頻。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encode the alpha channel data as an additional interleaved channel.

value.span: 如果影像是利用額外的交錯 Alpha 色頻進行編碼則為 ，如果使用平面 Alpha 色頻則為 。

span.span: if the image is encoded with an additional interleaved alpha channel; if planar alpha channel is used.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交錯的 alpha 色板只支援特定像素格式。Interleaved alpha channels are only supported by certain pixel formats.

member this.Lossless : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要使用不失真壓縮來進行編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encode using lossless compression.

value.span: 表示使用不失真壓縮，否則為 。

span.span: to use lossless compression; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte OverlapLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.OverlapLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定重疊處理等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the overlap processing level.
The overlap processing level.
The default is 1.

item.description: 沒有重疊處理已啟用。
一個層級的重疊處理已啟用。4 x 4 區塊的編碼的值會修改根據鄰近區塊的值。
處理重疊的兩個層級啟用。除了處理第一個層級 16 x 16 巨集區塊的編碼的值會修改根據鄰近巨集區塊的值。
No overlap processing is enabled.
One level of overlap processing is enabled. Encoded values of 4x4 blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring blocks.
Two levels of overlap processing are enabled. In addition to the first level of processing, encoded values of 16x16 macro blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring macro blocks.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte QualityLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.QualityLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定主要影像的壓縮品質。

span.span: Gets or sets the compression quality for the main image.
The compression quality for the main image.

value.span: 值 1 視為不失真，而值越高表示壓縮比率越高，影像品質也越差。

span.span: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and higher values indicate a high compression ratio and lower image quality.

value.span: 範圍介於 1 和 255 之間。

span.span: The range is 1 to 255.
The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Byte SubsamplingLevel { System::Byte get(); void set(System::Byte value); };
member this.SubsamplingLevel : byte with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 RGB 影像編碼的子取樣等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.

value.span: RGB 影像編碼的子取樣等級。

span.span: The sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.
The range is 0 to 3.
The default is 3.

item.description: 4:0:0 的編碼方式。色度內容會被捨棄。亮度會保留。
4:2:0 編碼方式。色度解析度會減 1/4 的亮度解析度。
4:2:2 編碼方式。色度解析度會減少到 1/2 的亮度解析度。
4:4:4 編碼方式。保留色度解析度。
4:0:0 encoding. Chroma content is discarded; luminance is preserved.
4:2:0 encoding. Chroma resolution is reduced by 1/4 of luminance resolution.
4:2:2 encoding. Chroma resolution is reduced to 1/2 of luminance resolution.
4:4:4 encoding. Chroma resolution is preserved.

exception.span: 指定的值不在 0 和 3 之間。

span.span: The value given is not between 0 and 3.

span.span: if codec options are to be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`， ， ，和用來取代。When is `true`, , , and are used in place of the . 當是`false`， ， ，和設定根據。When is `false`, , , and are set based on .

member this.VerticalTileSlices : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要在壓縮編碼期間使用的垂直分割數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of vertical divisions to use during compression encoding.

summary.span: 單一分割可以建立兩個垂直區域。

span.span: A single division creates two vertical regions.

value.span: 要在壓縮編碼期間使用的垂直分割數。

span.span: The number of vertical divisions to use during compression encoding.
The value range is 0 to 4095.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，必須設定為 0。If is `true`, must be set to 0. 相除所建立的磚不可以小於 16 像素為單位。A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels. 值會調整為維護小的區塊大小。The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size. 當用於搭配，方格的磚不正確。When used in combination with , a grid of tiles is formed. 例如，如果這兩個屬性會設定為 1，映像分為 4 的磚。For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.
